name: FunctionCode
title: Possible codes for the Function Extension
description: This CodeSystem contains the possible functions that can be used in the function extension

concept.definition: The Function returns the age of the patient at the time the resource was created. The age is computed from the birthdate of the patient and the creation date of the resource
The Function returns the number of matching resources, but not the resources
The Function removes the text element from the returned resource
The Function returns only the attributes of the resource that are marked as summary in the resources StructureDefinition
The Function returns only the attributes of the resource that are specified in the parameters
